text: Philodendron ventricosum is a species of plant in the family Araceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador ventricosum Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Philodendron ventricosum
